TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件中的插入按钮时单击模板时，前后控件更新数据源处的记录。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked, and after the control updates the record at the data source. (插入按钮是一个按钮的`CommandName`属性设置为"插入"。)事件使您可以执行自定义操作，如从数据库中插入项检索自动生成的值。(An Insert button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Insert".) The event enables you to perform a custom action, such as retrieving auto-generated values from the database for the inserted item. 一个对象传递给事件处理方法，使您能够确定项已插入和可能发生的任何异常的数量。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of items inserted and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受影响的插入操作的项的数目，请使用属性。To determine the number of items affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用属性来确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether an exception occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常中的事件处理方法通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您需要访问已发送到数据源，使用的字段值插入项的属性。If you have to access the field values of the inserted item that were sent to the data source, use the property. 默认情况下控制清除后插入操作，使用户能够添加新项要插入的值的模板。By default, the control clears the template after an insert operation, which enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted. 如果在插入操作期间发生异常，则可以保留控件处于插入模式，通过设置属性设置为`true`。If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 这将重新绑定从以前的尝试将某个项插入到值的模板。This rebinds the template to the values from the previous attempt to insert an item. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给处理程序对象事件。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to the handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#1)]

param.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

param.name: exception
param.span: 执行插入操作时引发的异常（如果有）。

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中包含的对象`e`参数。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定受影响的插入操作的记录数，返回的数据源控件。Use the property to determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, as returned by the data source control. 此属性通常用于以下方案：This property is typically used in the following scenarios: - 若要验证已插入单个记录。To verify that only a single record was inserted. 有时，编写不正确的 insert 语句可以插入多个记录。Sometimes an incorrectly written insert statement can insert multiple records. - 若要验证在插入操作期间出错，但不是引发了异常，因为不插入一条记录。To verify that a record was not inserted because an error occurred during the insert operation, but an exception was not raised. - 若要验证是否支持冲突检测 （乐观并发） 在数据源控件时，已插入记录及其属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。To verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 支持此属性的控件包括和控件。Controls that supports this property include the and controls. 当属性具有此值时，一条记录可能不插入是否为插入的另一个用户的记录相同密钥值。When the property has this value, a record might not be inserted if it has the same key value as a record inserted by another user. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给处理程序对象事件来确定是否在插入操作期间引发了异常。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to a handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 在插入操作过程中引发的异常，如果未引发异常，则为 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the insert operation, or if no exception was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发了一个异常和事件处理程序中，设置中处理异常属性设置为`true`。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否则为控件重新引发的异常。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给处理程序对象事件来确定是否在插入操作期间引发了异常。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to a handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当插入操作期间引发异常时，使用属性以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，异常将被视为处理且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果此属性设置为`false`，则控件重新引发的异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给处理程序对象事件来确定是否在插入操作期间引发了异常。The following example shows how to use the object that is passed to the handler for the event to determine whether an exception was raised during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInInsertMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为 模板内的控件保留用户输入值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the template.

value.span: 如果为 模板内的控件保留用户输入值，则为 ；如果用该控件的默认值替代用户输入值，则为 。

span.span: if the user's input values are preserved for the controls inside the template; if the user's input values are replaced with the default values for the controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下控件将从控件的值重置为其默认值插入操作后的模板。By default, the control resets the control's values from the template to their default values after an insert operation. 这样用户就可以添加新项要插入的值。This enables users to add values for a new item to be inserted. 如果在插入操作期间引发异常，则可以保留控件处于插入模式，通过设置属性设置为`true`。If an exception is raised during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 这可保持先前尝试插入的项内的控件中的值模板。This maintains the values from the previous attempt to insert an item for the controls inside the template. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以保留在插入操作期间发生错误时由用户输入的值。The following example shows how to use the property to preserve the values entered by the user when an error occurs during the insert operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/CS/ListViewItemInsertedCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted/VB/ListViewItemInsertedVB.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取插入记录的字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: 插入记录的字段名称/值对。

span.span: The field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问用于插入记录的字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录插入的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 属性返回对象，它实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示插入的记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. 若要访问的字段名称，请使用属性的对象。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，通过使用访问的字段值属性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如) 可以仅按索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index.
